name: Football Runner
description:
WEB VERSION IS DEMO. DOWNLOAD FULL VERSION(WITH TUTORIAL)!

SPAM ACTION BUTTON TO RELEASE

DON'T MOVE AND PRESS ACTION BUTTON TO TAKE SELFIE

Mouse&KeyBoard Controls:

Action Button - Z or X or Space or D or R or LeftMouseButton

Move - HOLD W or RightMouseButton

Joystick Controls (testing):

Action Button - South Button

Move - LeftStick

-----------------------

Welcome to Football Runner!

Hold on as long as you can on a football pitch! Do the most epic run, and make all your dreams come true!

The game was developed for android, a PC version with alternative controls was prepared for itch.io. Soon release in Google Play!

Any suggestions, opinions, feedback, bugs, help are warmly welcomed! It is very important for us!

Thank you for playing!

-----------------------
